metadata.title: CVE-2014-2553 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System(OTRS) 3.1.x before 3.1.21, 3.2.x before 3.2.16, and 3.3.x before 3.3.6allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia vectors related to dynamic fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2553` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 3.3.6-1
otrs2 - 3.3.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.6-1').
